content:
The Project Management Masterclass by Project Management Institute (PMI) on Mar 10-11 is a 2-day online event. Here's more information about the agenda and the instructor:

**Agenda:**

Day 1: March 10

* 9:00 AM - 10:00 AM ET: Introduction to Project Management Fundamentals
	+ Overview of project management principles and terminology
	+ Understanding the project management framework
* 10:15 AM - 12:00 PM ET: Project Initiation and Planning
	+ Defining project scope and goals
	+ Developing a project charter and stakeholder analysis
	+ Creating a project schedule and resource allocation plan
* 1:00 PM - 2:30 PM ET: Project Execution and Monitoring
	+ Executing project tasks and activities
	+ Monitoring and controlling project progress
	+ Identifying and managing project risks
* 2:45 PM - 4:15 PM ET: Project Closure and Evaluation
	+ Formalizing project completion and finalizing project deliverables
	+ Documenting lessons learned and evaluating project success

Day 2: March 11

* 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM ET: Agile Methodologies and Hybrid Approaches
	+ Introduction to agile project management principles and frameworks
	+ Understanding hybrid approaches to project management
* 10:45 AM - 12:15 PM ET: Leadership and Team Management
	+ Developing effective project leadership and communication skills
	+ Building and managing high-performing project teams
* 1:00 PM - 2:30 PM ET: Risk Management and Quality Control
	+ Identifying and mitigating project risks
	+ Implementing quality control processes and assurance activities
* 2:45 PM - 4:15 PM ET: Case Studies and Group Discussions
	+ Applying project management concepts to real-world scenarios
	+ Group discussions and Q&A session

**Instructor:**

The instructor for this masterclass is **Dr. Vijay Kanabar**, PMP, PMI-ACP, CSM. Dr. Kanabar is a seasoned project management professional with over 20 years of experience in managing complex projects across various industries. He is a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) and Agile Certified Practitioner (ACP) with PMI, as well as a Certified Scrum Master (CSM).

Dr. Kanabar has extensive experience in project management training and has taught project management courses at various universities and institutions. He is known for his engaging teaching style and ability to simplify complex project management concepts.

**What to Expect:**

* Interactive online sessions with live Q&A
* Practical exercises and case studies to reinforce learning
* Opportunities to network with fellow project management professionals
* Digital course materials and resources
* 12 PDUs (Professional Development Units) towards PMI certification

Please note that the agenda and instructor are subject to change, and you should check the official PMI website or registration page for the latest information.
